X-Yahoo-Profile: alienseedpod

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KMy2zRN4d38

I hope to check the code into SVN soon, there are also a few fixes
that have been submitted to the SVN repository recently, some fairly
significant, e.g. the prey capture domain was effectively completely
broken (it works a lot better now!). Will aim to make package up a new
SharpNEAT release 7zip soon.

Regarding the walker, any advice on improving the fitness function?
This one has stop conditions for when one or both of the feet are too
high, the torso height goes below a threshold or any of the the joint
angles go beyond 90 degrees. Ideally I'd like to avoid these and make
it more open ended (and punish for applied torque to get efficient
walkers) but the reality was that that didn't seem to work very well.

Regards,

Colin
